start.text: Vessel has cleared warm-up. Time to get to work, team.
The scanner just lit up like a Christmas tree!
Time for a round of pest control, team.

start_boss.text: We've got a hell of a blip heading your way team! Get ready!
Something big is headed your way. Better prepare for the worst.

engaged.text: Incoming! Smoke em' if you got em'!

need_help.text: Swarm! It's a big one team!

pursuing.text: Hostiles are backing down. Finish them!
The wave is significantly diminished. Well done, team!

hull_90.text: Enemies engaging! Take em' out, we got work to do.

hull_50.text: I advise that you get the enemies off of us before Management asks me to flood the lower decks with radon gas.
If this continues, Management has the power and will to close the bar! Is that what you want!?

hull_30.text: Orders from management: Stop dancing and get the shields up!

overload.text: Flux capacitors are to be left alone and not hurled, kicked, tossed, or in any way moved around.

death.text: Deep Rock Galactic thanks you for your service.

victory.text: Nicely done, team. You've just secured yourself a nice bonus!
All quotas met. Well done, team!
Job well done! Bring it all home, team!
